message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in great condition and worth every penny.  Let me know your thoughts!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product and I am interested in purchasing it. However, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the item.
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $12,000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit.  How about $13,500?  It's still a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and I respect your valuation of the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $13,000. This price takes into account the value of the product and also leaves some room for both of us.
